com.parkit.*

  • com.parkit.parkingsystem.constants.DBConstants
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public static final java.lang.String GET_EXITING_VEHICUL_TICKET "select t.PARKING_NUMBER, t.ID, t.PRICE, t.IN_TIME, t.OUT_TIME, p.TYPE from ticket t,parking p where p.parking_number = t.parking_number and t.OUT_TIME is null and t.VEHICLE_REG_NUMBER=? order by t.IN_TIME limit 1"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_NEXT_PARKING_SPOT "select min(PARKING_NUMBER) from parking where AVAILABLE = true and TYPE = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_NUMBER_OF_AVAILABLE_PARKING_SPOT "select count(*) from parking where AVAILABLE = true"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_NUMBER_OF_AVAILABLE_PARKING_SPOT_TYPE "select count(*) from parking where AVAILABLE = true and TYPE = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_NUMBER_OF_TICKETS_WHERE_VREG_TYPE "select count(*) from ticket t, parking p where t.VEHICLE_REG_NUMBER=? and p.TYPE=? and t.OUT_TIME IS NULL"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_TICKET "select t.PARKING_NUMBER, t.ID, t.PRICE, t.IN_TIME, t.OUT_TIME, p.TYPE from ticket t,parking p where p.parking_number = t.parking_number and t.VEHICLE_REG_NUMBER=? order by t.IN_TIME limit 1"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_TICKET_OF_LOYAL_CUSTOMER "select t.PARKING_NUMBER, t.ID, t.PRICE, t.IN_TIME, t.OUT_TIME, p.TYPE from ticket t,parking p where p.parking_number = t.parking_number and t.OUT_TIME IS NOT NULL and t.PRICE IS NOT NULL and t.VEHICLE_REG_NUMBER=? order by t.IN_TIME limit 1"
    public static final java.lang.String SAVE_TICKET "insert into ticket(PARKING_NUMBER, VEHICLE_REG_NUMBER, PRICE, IN_TIME, OUT_TIME) values(?,?,?,?,?)"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_OUT_TIME_OF_TICKET "update ticket set OUT_TIME=? where ID=?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_PARKING_SPOT "update parking set available = ? where PARKING_NUMBER = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_PRICE_OF_TICKET "update ticket set PRICE=? where ID=?"
    public static final java.lang.String UPDATE_TICKET "update ticket set PRICE=?, OUT_TIME=? where ID=?"
